# OpInterface definitions
## BinaryOpInterface (`ELF_BinaryOpInterface`)

Interface for the ELF binary serialization of operations
### Methods:
#### `serialize`

```c++
void serialize(elf::writer::BinaryDataSection<uint8_t>&binDataSection);
```
Serialize the Op to the BLOB format
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

#### `getBinarySize`

```c++
size_t getBinarySize();
```
Get the size in bytes of the serialized form of this object
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

#### `getAlignmentRequirements`

```c++
static size_t getAlignmentRequirements();
```
Get the alignment requirements for the serialization of this op
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

#### `getAccessingProcs`

```c++
::vpux::ELF::SectionFlagsAttr getAccessingProcs();
```
Get the accessing processors of the Op
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

#### `getUserProcs`

```c++
::vpux::ELF::SectionFlagsAttr getUserProcs();
```
Get the accessing processors of the Op user(s)
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

#### `getMemorySpace`

```c++
vpux::VPURT::BufferSection getMemorySpace();
```
Get the memory space in which the serialization of this op will reside
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

## GetOffsetOfOpInterface (`ELF_GetOffsetOfOpInterface`)

Interface for the offset computation of different fields of inside serializable operations
### Methods:
#### `getOffsetOfWithinOperation`

```c++
mlir::FailureOr<uint64_t> getOffsetOfWithinOperation(mlir::Value val);
```
Returns the offset of a field (specified by the 'val' parameter) inside a serializable op
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

## ElfObjectInterface (`ELF_OpInterface`)

Interface for the ELF object
### Methods:
#### `serialize`

```c++
void serialize(elf::Writer&writer);
```
Serialize the Op to the BLOB format
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

## ElfRelocationObjectInterface (`ELF_RelocationObjectInterface`)

Interface for the ELF relocation objects
### Methods:
#### `serialize`

```c++
void serialize(elf::writer::Relocation*relocation, vpux::DenseMap<mlir::Operation*, elf::writer::Symbol*>&symbolMap);
```
Serialize an object as an ELF relocation object
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

## ElfSectionInterface (`ELF_SectionInterface`)

Interface for the ELF section
### Methods:
#### `serialize`

```c++
void serialize(elf::Writer&writer, vpux::DenseMap<mlir::Operation*, elf::writer::Section*>&sectionMap, vpux::DenseMap<mlir::Operation*, elf::writer::Symbol*>&symbolMap);
```
Serialize the Section into an ELF entity
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

#### `getBlock`

```c++
mlir::Block*getBlock();
```
Get the block of the region
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

#### `getName`

```c++
llvm::StringRef getName();
```
Get the name of the section
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

## ElfSymbolObjectInterface (`ELF_SymbolObjectInterface`)

Interface for the ELF symbol objects
### Methods:
#### `serialize`

```c++
void serialize(elf::writer::Symbol*symbol, vpux::DenseMap<mlir::Operation*, elf::writer::Section*>&sectionMap);
```
Serialize an object as an ELF symbol
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.
